QuestData.Title: Pusillin The Thief
QuestData.Description: Me take quick nap earlier and stupid fast imp take book! Dagg'thol need book to follow orders and Master need book to conquer! Gah!$B$BYou $r help me get book from imp, and I give you shiny something. Go, imp right there to da left! KILL!!!
QuestData.LogDescription: Convince Pusillin to give up the Book of Incantations.
QuestData.RewardText: Now you watch Master use book to kill stupid trees and stupid goat men! YAR!
